acceptance.author: wondible
acceptance.description: By installing and using this mod you indicate your acceptance of the pre-release disclaimer.  So you don't have to do it EVERY... SINGLE... TIME... you start the game.

advancedplanetdetails.author: Dementiurge
advancedplanetdetails.description: Shows planet details in the New Game and Lobby screens.

alertsManager.description: Filter what alerts you want to see. Also provides a Framework for a unified, easy to use alerts API that does not create conflicts between mods.
alertsManager.author: Cola_Colin

alphaenergy.description: Replaces the energy plant model with one from the Alpha.
alphaenergy.author: Stuart98

anchorsfx.description: Replaces the sound effect for the Anchor firing with that of the Umbrella.
anchorsfx.author: Stuart98

autoselect_commander.author: wondible and friends
autoselect_commander.description: Select your commander when starting the game.  With inspiration and support from tatsujb, raevn, Cola_Colin, and the PA modders forum.

bAnchorButtons.description: Click once to set camera anchor, and again to snap back there.
bAnchorButtons.description_nl: Sla Cameraposities op met een knop en klik nog eens om terug te keren.
bAnchorButtons.author: burntcustard, proeleert, cptconundrum

blackscreenfix.description: Fix for Blackscreens when loading css in mods for PA v.63180
blackscreenfix.author: Cola_Colin, PRoeleert, wondible

bRemoveAlertPIPs.description: Stops a PIP appearing when putting mouse over an alert, to help reduce lag.
bRemoveAlertPIPs.author: burntcustard

bShowSecondaryColour.description: Shows secondary colours in lobby, and allows you to select which you use.
bShowSecondaryColour.author: burntcustard, DeathByDenim

BuildPower.description: Shows the fabrication rate and energy consumption of the selected units and factories
BuildPower.author: ORFJackal

bUITweaks.description: Removes empty build bar boxes and does stuff
bUITweaks.author: burntcustard

cEnhancedSystemPreview.description: Improves the system selection screen so that you can see every planet in a system.
cEnhancedSystemPreview.author: Captain Conundrum

cGGButton.description: Plays the GG Button sound every time someone types GG in chat.
cGGButton.author: Captain Conundrum

cheeseDevStage.description: Corrects the beginning of the version number to Cheese
cheeseDevStage.author: someonewhoisnobody

circleToLine.description: Changes all the circle builds to line build (metal+energy storage)
circleToLine.author: ZaphodX, iceDrop

cLobbyRenamer.description: Lets you change the game lobby name that shows in the server browser.
cLobbyRenamer.author: Captain Conundrum

corBetterBuildBars.description: Updated for galactic war! Only one preset now, doesn't require settings manager anymore
corBetterBuildBars.author: Corang

corLingerPiP.description: changes the PiP alert that when your mouse hovers over it and leaves it 'lingererers' for 3 seconds then disappears
corLingerPiP.author: Corang

cPAStatsCharts.description: Gives spectators a button to show live PA Stats charts in the game. You can also open the chart with ctrl+space
cPAStatsCharts.author: Captain Conundrum, Cola_Colin, someonewhoisnobody

cPlanetNameThemes.description: Replaces Uber's random names with planet names from Star Wars, Stargate, Star Trek or Legacy (Names from TA and SupCom). Pick the theme from the settings menu.
cPlanetNameThemes.author: Captain Conundrum

cPlanetPips.description: Adds a button in the system panel to focus the pip on that planet.
cPlanetPips.author: Captain Conundrum, maxpowerz

cShareSystems.description: Share your favorite systems with other users. eXodus eSports, PACE, and The Realm maps are available as well.
cShareSystems.author: Captain Conundrum

cSketchJS.description: Adds a sketch.js layer over the game window so that casters can draw lines or arrows on the screen.
cSketchJS.author: Captain Conundrum, LavaSnake, Martenus

cTrackingPips.description: Opens a new picture-in-picture that tracks the selected unit if you press CTRL+T. INCOMPATIBLE with the Draggable Pip mod for now.
cTrackingPips.author: Captain Conundrum

CustomSkybox.description: Use and import different skyboxes. Visit www.superouman.net/planetary-annihilation-skyboxes.html to get a large catalog of skyboxes
CustomSkybox.author: superouman

dBetterSystemView.description: Adds a Metal Spot count to the System View and makes it show all the time.
dBetterSystemView.author: danzel

dFavouriteColour.author: DeathByDenim
dFavouriteColour.description: Automatically selects your favourite colour in the lobby.
dFavouriteColour.description_nl: Kiest automatisch uw favoriete kleur in de lobby.
dFavouriteColour.description_de: Wählt automatisch Ihre Lieblingsfarbe in der Lobby aus.
dFavouriteColour.description_fr: Choisit automatiquement votre couleur préférée dans le foyer.

dinosaurfix.description: Fixes a bug where the Ptahosaurus is not correctly displayed in the main menu.
dinosaurfix.author: Pt4h

dNotes.author: DeathByDenim
dNotes.description: Keep notes on players for future reference
dNotes.description_nl: Houd notities over spelers bij voor toekomstig gebruik.
dNotes.description_de: Führen Sie Notizen über die andere Spieler für zukünftige Verwendung.
dNotes.description_fr: Enregistrer des notes à propos des autres joueurs pour utiliser en futur.

dPlayersInServerBrowser.author: DeathByDenim
dPlayersInServerBrowser.description: Shows which players are in a game from the server browser without actually joining the lobby.
dPlayersInServerBrowser.description_nl: Laat zien welke spelers deelnemen aan een spel vanuit de server browser zonder de lobby zelf in te gaan.
dPlayersInServerBrowser.description_de: Zeigt Ihnen welche Spieler teilnehmen an einem Spiel aus dem Serverbrowser ohne im Lobby selbst zu gehen.
dPlayersInServerBrowser.description_fr: Montrer quels joueurs participer à un jeu dans le navigateur serveur sans entrer le foyer.

dReminderTimer.description: Provides a timer to show how long the current match has been running
dReminderTimer.author: danzel

dShowOffline.author: DeathByDenim
dShowOffline.description: Shows off-line status of fellow players.
dShowOffline.description_nl: Toont de off-line status van de medespelers.
dShowOffline.description_de: Zeigen Sie den off-line Status der Mitspieler.

dTimer.description: Provides a timer to show how long the current match is running
dTimer.author: danzel

fabulous_selections.author: wondible
fabulous_selections.description: Highlight commanders and fabulous fabbers in the selected unit icons.

favCommander.description: Automatically chooses the commander selected in the armory
favCommander.author: SideSplitter

gross_economy.author: wondible
gross_economy.description: Status bar that emphasises income and expense so that they can be visually compared.

HideFogOfWar.description: Removes the grey lighting from the fog of war. For cinematic purposes.
HideFogOfWar.author: superouman

hotbuild2.description: Map 1 Key to multiple build actions and more... (See forum link for screenshots and instructions.)
hotbuild2.description_nl: Kies een toetsenbordknop om meerdere gebouwen te bouwen en meer... (bekijk forum voor screenshots en instructies.)
hotbuild2.author: proeleert,tripax,cola_colin

inGameBrowser.description: Adds an in game web browser
inGameBrowser.author: someonewhoisnobody

instant_sandbox.author: wondible
instant_sandbox.description: One click to start a game vs an AI with no economy, or as configured in settings.

jungletropical.description: Replaces the icon for the Tropical planet in the system editor with a more fitting icon.
jungletropical.author: Stuart98

kodef.description: Speed up the UI a _lot_. May introduce UI bugs. Test for yourself, report in the forums :)
kodef.author: Cola_Colin

LavaSnakes_Ant.description: PA has a bug that prevents it from displaying the Ant's proper name; this mod fixes that.
LavaSnakes_Ant.author: LavaSnake

LavaSnakes_CustomInGameTimers.description: Three customizable in-game timers for reminders and other events. (See forum link for screenshots and instructions.)
LavaSnakes_CustomInGameTimers.author: LavaSnake

LavaSnakes_CustomUnitNames.description: Lets you set your own custom names for each unit and building in the settings menu.
LavaSnakes_CustomUnitNames.author: LavaSnake

LavaSnakes_ProfilePicFixer.description: A powerful mod that lets you set a profile picture, a tracking/sig picture, and custom HTML snippets for PA's main menu.
LavaSnakes_ProfilePicFixer.author: LavaSnake

LavaSnakes_StargateBugFix.description: PA has a bug that prevents it from displaying the Stargate's proper name; this mod fixes that.
LavaSnakes_StargateBugFix.author: LavaSnake

LavaSnakes_StargateUnitNames.description: Ever wanted to command legions of Jaffa warriors, swarms of Abrams tanks, or fleets of X-302s? Well now you can with the Stargate Unit Names mod!
LavaSnakes_StargateUnitNames.author: LavaSnake

lineToCircle.description: Changes the line builds to circle build (energy plant + advanced energy plant)
lineToCircle.author: yuuzhantar

linger.author: wondible
linger.description: Prevent the game from exiting immediately, and provides a button to go to game over.

maxTinyPoles.description: Reduces the size of the 'N' and 'S' pole indicators
maxTinyPoles.author: maxpowerz

metalbackground.description: Replaces the earth planet background with the promotional metal planet art.
metalbackground.author: Stuart98

mEventHandler.description: A Framework for handling process events sent to the engine
mEventHandler.author: Mauru

missile_command.author: wondible
missile_command.description: Provides limited assistance for managing nuke launchers.

MushroomarsRainbow.description: Factory fab shader that makes you taste the rainbow!
MushroomarsRainbow.author: MushrooMars

nScreens.description: Mod tries to make it easier to configure multiscreen pip setups. Best used together with some sort of fullscreen script
nScreens.author: Cola_Colin

pa_strat_build_icons.description: Display strategic  build icons over normal build icons
pa_strat_build_icons.author: eluvatar

PAMentor.description: Shows how your in-game stats compare to other players, to help in learning how fast to expand
PAMentor.author: ORFJackal

PixelIcons.description: Strategic icons in the style of Supreme Commander
PixelIcons.author: Xedi

powReturnToServerBrowser.description: Hate that Main Menu upon failing to join a game? Fret not, now you get back to the list of games.
powReturnToServerBrowser.author: pownie

powTwitchOnStart.description: Allows to login to twitch and control the stream from the main menu
powTwitchOnStart.author: pownie

rAlertsFilter.description: Allows selection of which unit types display alerts when built, under attack or destroyed
rAlertsFilter.author: Raevn

rBiggerArmoryImages.description: Adds a large preview image of the selected Commander in the Armoury
rBiggerArmoryImages.author: Raevn

rBlueprintInfoFramework.description: A Framework for obtaining unit, tool and ammo data
rBlueprintInfoFramework.author: Raevn

rChatPlayerColour.description: Changes the colour of player names in the in-game chat to match their team colour
rChatPlayerColour.author: raevn

rChronoClick.description: Set Chrono time by clicking any point on the chrono bar
rChronoClick.author: Raevn

rCommanderHP.description: Adds a HUD that tracks your commander's health and more!
rCommanderHP.author: LavaSnake, raevn, and others

reconnect_button.author: wondible
reconnect_button.description: Provides a Reconnect button on the start menu when you are still assigned to a game.  A reconnect option is also provided in the live game ESC menu which will attempt to restore a disconnected session.

rFloatFrame.description: Framework for creating draggable UI containers
rFloatFrame.author: raevn

rModsList.description: Adds a 'Mods' tab on the main menu which shows a list of currently enabled mods, and if any require updates
rModsList.author: Raevn

rUnitDatabase.description: View details on all PA units
rUnitDatabase.author: Raevn

sandbox_biome.author: wondible
sandbox_biome.description: Enable the grid sandbox biome in the system editor, just in case moon isn't flat enough.

sirHighlightedBuildings.description: Green: Economic - Blue: Factories - Red: Strategic - Yellow: Defensive -- T2 Buildings have a more intense glow
sirHighlightedBuildings.author: sirscruff - packaging:Corang

SpacedOutDefenceTowers.description: Puts more space between dragged turret lines
SpacedOutDefenceTowers.author: superouman

SpectatorVision.description: Improved spectator visibility controls. Use Shift-Click to select multiple players.
SpectatorVision.author: ORFJackal

tAnnoyMe.description: Audibly alert the player, repeatedly, when the economy is being wasted or stalling.
tAnnoyMe.author: trialq

tauntMod.description: Adds Age Of Empires II Taunts to Planetary Annihilation
tauntMod.author: SideSplitter

tAutoFactory.description: Automatically build units with idle factories, when eco would otherwise be wasted
tAutoFactory.author: trialq

tBeastIcoHotfix.description: Fixes the Beast Commander icon in the armory.
tBeastIcoHotfix.author: Stuart98

tBuildingWriter.description: Use buildings to write text. See forum for details
tBuildingWriter.author: trialq

tCustomBuildBar.description: Adds a custom tab to the build bar
tCustomBuildBar.author: trialq

tDidYouKnow.description: Provides short bites of information. Did you know this mod is awesome?
tDidYouKnow.author: trialq

tDoxCommMode.description: Replaces commander graphics with dox (build a dox army and play hide-and-seek). Gentlemen's rules, everyone must enable it and use the tank commander.
tDoxCommMode.author: trialq

teamBuildColor.description: Changes the Build Color to your Team Color instead of green
teamBuildColor.author: rcix

teamspeak.description: Shows a overlay for TeamSpeak chat. Requires TeamSpeak3 WebSockets plugin (see forum thread)
teamspeak.author: danzel

tGWDeck.description: A new deck for use in Galactic War
tGWDeck.author: trialq

tGWLoadout.description: New loadouts for use in Galactic War
tGWLoadout.author: trialq

tGWSpeedHotfix.description: Fixes the stock cards that buff a units speed, so the buff is actually applied.
tGWSpeedHotfix.author: trialq

tSystemEditorFix.description: Adds input validation in system editor, so editor crashes less
tSystemEditorFix.author: trialq

uimod-scaleui.description: Allows to scale the UI for smaller display resolutions
uimod-scaleui.author: Cola_Colin

wEconomyGraph.description: Shows a live graph depicting your Energy and Metal income history.
wEconomyGraph.author: The Magnificent Werty

wModPing.description: Can ping your enabled mods into ingame chat.
wModPing.author: The Magnificent Werty

wScriptSource.description: [mod debug tool] Enables easy breakpoints and clean overview of all mod sources in the Coherent UI Debugger. Warning: Shadows common.js to include scripts into head by src and not by appending text.
wScriptSource.author: The Magnificent Werty
